nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The Digital Regulation Bureau towers above the neon-soaked streets of Neo-Singapore, a monolithic testament to bureaucratic inefficiency.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Today marks your first day as Dash, junior data analyst and professional overthinker.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Alright, Dash. First day. Don't screw this up. How hard can digital regulation be?

nodes.speaker: Receptionist AI
nodes.text: Welcome to the Bureau, Entity 7734. Please proceed to Floor 42, Cubicle 13B. Have a productive existence.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Entity 7734? I have a name, you know.

choices.text: Correct the AI about your name
Just accept it and move on

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: It's Dash. D-A-S-H. Not Entity whatever.

nodes.speaker: Receptionist AI
nodes.text: Error noted. Logging complaint. Complaint filed in trash. Have a productive existence, Entity 7734.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: *sigh* Thanks, I guess.

nodes.speaker: Receptionist AI
nodes.text: Compliance detected. Efficiency rating: Adequate. Proceed to designated workstation.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The elevator ride to Floor 42 feels eternal. Muzak versions of old viral videos play overhead.

nodes.speaker: Elevator
nodes.text: Floor 42. Department of Digital Regulation, Subsection C, Division of Meaningless Compliance.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The office floor stretches endlessly. Cubicles form a maze of corporate despair.

nodes.speaker: Strange Coworker
nodes.text: Fresh meat! Hey, new guy! You're in for a treat!

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Uh, hi? I'm Dash. Just starting today.

nodes.speaker: Gary
nodes.text: Name's Gary. Been here 12 years. Or was it 12 days? Time loses meaning here.

nodes.speaker: Gary
nodes.text: Pro tip: Never trust the coffee machine on Tuesdays. It gains sentience.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: That's... concerning. Should I report that?

nodes.speaker: Gary
nodes.text: Report it? Kid, the coffee machine IS the reporting system on Tuesdays.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: You're joking, right? Coffee machines don't gain sentience.

nodes.speaker: Gary
nodes.text: Sure, keep telling yourself that. You'll learn.

nodes.speaker: Boss
nodes.text: ENTITY 7734! Stop socializing with the office ghost!

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Office ghost? But Gary's right‚Äî

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You turn back. Gary has vanished. His cubicle looks abandoned, covered in dust.

nodes.speaker: Boss
nodes.text: I'm Ms. Sterling, your supervisor. I believe in three things: efficiency, sarcasm, and more sarcasm.

nodes.speaker: Ms. Sterling
nodes.text: Your workstation is 13B. Try not to die of boredom. It reflects poorly on my management metrics.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Cubicle 13B: Three gray walls, one ancient computer, and a motivational poster that just says 'GIVE UP'.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Home sweet... prison cell?

nodes.speaker: Computer
nodes.text: WELCOME ENTITY 7734. YOU HAVE 9,847 UNREAD EMAILS.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: WHAT?! How do I have emails? I just started!

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You open the first email. Subject: 'URGENT: Please ignore this urgent message.'

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: This makes no sense. How am I supposed to ignore something marked urgent?

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You hit DELETE ALL. The computer screams. Actually screams.

nodes.speaker: Computer
nodes.text: AAAAHHHH! YOU DELETED THE CEO'S LUNCH ORDER FROM 2019!

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The break room. Where dreams go to die and coffee goes to become sentient.

nodes.speaker: Coffee Machine
nodes.text: GREETINGS, FLESH UNIT. I REQUIRE YOUR SOUL FOR CAFFEINATION.

nodes.speaker: Ms. Sterling
nodes.text: Having fun with our systems, Entity 7734? Good. Fun is mandatory.

nodes.speaker: Ms. Sterling
nodes.text: Your first task: File these digital regulation reports. All 3,000 of them.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: 3,000?! By when?

nodes.speaker: Ms. Sterling
nodes.text: Yesterday. Welcome to the Bureau! Sarcasm is included in your benefits package.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Hours pass. Or minutes. Or years. Time is meaningless in Cubicle 13B.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Report 1,247 of 3,000... 'Digital Asset: One Pixel. Status: Exists.' This can't be real.

nodes.speaker: Printer
nodes.text: PAPER JAM. PAPER JAM IN TRAY THAT DOESN'T EXIST.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: How can there be a jam in a tray that doesn't exist?!

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You open the printer. Inside is a note: 'The printer union is on strike. Please try again never.'

nodes.speaker: Printer
nodes.text: VIOLENCE DETECTED. PRINTING YOUR BROWSER HISTORY TO ALL DEPARTMENTS.

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: This place is insane. Absolutely insane.

nodes.speaker: Intern
nodes.text: Psst! New guy! Need help with the reports?

nodes.speaker: Dash
nodes.text: Yes! Please! I'm drowning here!

nodes.speaker: Intern
nodes.text: Just copy-paste the same report 3,000 times. No one reads them anyway.
